reviewerDisplayName: S e k i 1 3 ' わたしは
reviewText:
Early Access Review

The game has a great potential but too weak to be a good game.
First of all, it's very very repetitive. All you need to do in this game is seek crystal into dungeons. Everytime you load a map you have a timer so you need to rush to find crystals to restart the map and create a bigger one. Repeat this as much as you find this fun.

I lasted 1 hour.
voteText: 3 of 4 people (75%) found this review helpful
